duties_responsibilities.duty: Restore patient's function, alleviate pain, and prevent disabilities by planning and administering medically prescribed physical therapy.
Assess and interpret evaluations and test results to provide quality care.
Determine physical therapy treatment plans in consultation with physicians or by prescription.
Administer manual exercises, give massages, and use equipment as necessary to help patients accomplish treatment plan.
Evaluate and record patient's progress, modify treatment plans, and try new treatments if required.
Document patient care services by charting in-patient and department records.
Instruct patients in proper in-home exercises and therapies.
Educate patients and their families about the recovery process and the challenges they will face.
Opportunity for visits from Dallas to Denison
